1294690.name: 04​:​42 Still Free from Haven Soundtrack
1294690.description:
“4:42 Still Free” is the first single unveiled from Haven's Original Soundtrack composed by DANGER.

In Haven you share the journey of two lovers escaped to a lost planet to stay together.

The full album will be available when the game is released later this year. In the meantime enjoy the music and:
-> Wishlist the game!
-> Join The Game Bakers' .
-> Check out more of DANGER's music.



The music video for the single is a long edit of Haven Opening Movie created and directed by Yukio Takastu, with the support of Yapiko Animation.

Credits
Original soundtrack composed by Danger.
Danger ℗ 2020 1789 - © 1789
Produced by The Game Bakers
Published by G4F Records
All rights reserved.
